Hypatia is a good martyr. She died at the hands of a mob of Christians in Alexandria in I think.. 410, for promoting science, and specifically what would be called atomic theory today. She was dragged out by a chariot, and her limbs were torn off, after she was raped (not 100% sure of the rape).
